net.hockeyapp.android.tasks

Class ConnectionTask<Params,Progress,Result>

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.os.AsyncTask<Params,Progress,Result>
      • net.hockeyapp.android.tasks.ConnectionTask<Params,Progress,Result>
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    LoginTask, SendFeedbackTask

    public abstract class ConnectionTask<Params,Progress,Result>
extends android.os.AsyncTask<Params,Progress,Result>

    Description

    Base class for asynchronous HTTP connections.
